import React from 'react'; import { useLocation } from 'react-router-dom'; const Invoice = () => { const location = useLocation(); const booking = location.state || {}; const handlePrint = () => { window.print(); }; return (
{/* Header */}

SarkariiBUSS

Booking Invoice

{/* Invoice Details */}

Invoice Number

{booking.invoiceNumber}

Booking Date

{new Date(booking.bookingDate).toLocaleDateString()}

{/* Journey Details */}

Journey Details

From

{booking.from}

To

{booking.to}

Date

{booking.date}

Bus Type

Deluxe AC Sleeper

{/* Passenger Details */}

Passenger Details

{booking.passengers?.map((passenger) => ( ))}
Seat No. Name Age Gender
{passenger.seat} {passenger.name} {passenger.age} {passenger.gender}
{/* Payment Details */}

Payment Details

Base Fare (per seat) NPR 1,600
Number of Seats {booking.selectedSeats?.length || 0}
Total Amount NPR {booking.paymentDetails?.amount.toLocaleString()}
{/* Print Button - Hidden when printing */}
{/* Footer */}

Thank you for choosing SarkariiBUSS!

For any assistance, contact us at support@sarkariibuss.com

); }; export default Invoice;
